dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT queue_Nm, distributer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($distributer_Id) AND distributer_Id = :distributer_Id #end ORDER BY distributer_Id DESC

SELECT qd.queue_Nm, d.distributer_Id, d.name, d.ip, d.port, d.system_Status, d.manual_Status FROM CSL_DISTRIBUTER d, CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER qd WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qd.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($name) AND d.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND d.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND d.port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND d.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND d.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND d.distributer_Id = qd.distributer_Id ORDER BY d.distributer_Id DESC

SELECT d.distributer_Id, d.name, d.ip, d.port, d.system_Status, d.manual_Status FROM CSL_DISTRIBUTER d WHERE 1=1 #if($name) AND d.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND d.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND d.port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND d.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND d.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND d.distributer_Id NOT IN (SELECT distributer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER WHERE queue_Nm = :queue_Nm) ORDER BY d.distributer_Id DESC

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, q.interval_Time, q.dph_Delay_Time, q.dph_Timeout, q.new_Pop_ThreadNum, q.new_Exe_ThreadNum, q.portion_Pop_ThreadNum, q.portion_Exe_ThreadNum, q.manual_Status, qd.distributer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER qd WHERE 1=1 #if($distributer_Id) AND qd.distributer_Id = :distributer_Id #end #if($queue_Nm) AND q.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qd.queue_Nm

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, q.interval_Time, q.new_Pop_ThreadNum, q.new_Exe_ThreadNum, q.portion_Pop_ThreadNum, q.portion_Exe_ThreadNum, q.manual_Status, qd.distributer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER qd WHERE 1=1 #if($distributer_Id) AND qd.distributer_Id = :distributer_Id #end #if($queue_Nm) AND q.queue_Nm LIKE :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qd.queue_Nm

SELECT d.distributer_Id, d.name, d.ip, d.port, d.system_Status, d.manual_Status qd.queue_Nm FROM CSL_DISTRIBUTER d, CSL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTER qd WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qd.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($name) AND d.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND d.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND d.port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND d.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND d.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND d.distributer_Id = qd.distributer_Id
